title: Remove long folder names under inbox
creator: alan.n1
content: Would like to remove the long folder names and only show the last sub folder name. For example instead of seeing INBOX.travel.Uk - only UK would be visible as part of the folder tree
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/133.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36;os:Win 11
